Community News

COMMUNITY WASTE DISPOSAL SERVICE UPDATE Community Waste Disposal revised collection services update.
CWD COLLECTION SERVICE UPDATE Community Waste Disposal has cancelled trash and recycling services for Tuesday, January 27.
CORINTH TRANSITIONS TO .GOV DOMAIN The City of Corinth has officially transitioned its website and staff email addresses to a .gov domain.
CORINTH POLICE DEPARTMENT ANNOUNCES PROMOTION OF CAPTAINS JIMMIE GREGG AND JESSE HUNTER TO DEPUTY CHIEF The City of Corinth is proud to announce the promotion of Captain Jimmie Gregg and Captain Jesse Hunter to the rank of Deputy Chief with the Corinth Police Department.
